description:
Maidena and Toxico belong to two different factions constantly at odds with each other. Now the conflict boils over. Again. For a really stupid reason.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Eine Verantwortung von allen / New World
Proposé aux conséquences / Un nouveau monde
Shiwayose wa Hashitte Kuru / New World
しわ寄せは走ってくる / ニューワールド
